bio: Maria is a classically trained chef who has been working in restaurants for over a decade. She is passionate about creating dishes that are both delicious and beautiful.

recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.method:
1. Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water.
2. Fry pancetta in a skillet.
3. Beat eggs and parmesan cheese in a bowl.
4. Add spaghetti to skillet, then add egg mixture.
5. Stir until eggs are cooked and spaghetti is coated in sauce.
6. Add black pepper to taste.

recipes.name: Coq au Vin
recipes.method:
1. Brown chicken thighs in a Dutch oven.
2. Remove chicken and fry bacon in the same pot.
3. Add mushrooms and pearl onions to pot.
4. Add red wine and chicken back to pot.
5. Simmer for 1-2 hours until chicken is tender and sauce is thick.
6. Serve over mashed potatoes.

recipes.name: Crème Brûlée
recipes.method:
1. Heat cream and vanilla extract in a saucepan.
2. Beat egg yolks and sugar in a bowl.
3. Slowly add cream mixture to egg mixture, whisking constantly.
4. Pour mixture into ramekins and bake in a water bath.
5. Chill in the fridge for at least 2 hours.
6. Sprinkle brown sugar on top and torch until caramelized.

bio: Maria Garcia is a renowned chef with over 15 years of experience in the culinary world. She is a master at blending traditional and modern cooking techniques to create unique and flavorful dishes.

recipes.name: Shrimp Ceviche
recipes.cookingMethod: mix all ingredients together and refrigerate for 1 hour

recipes.name: Grilled Fish Tacos
recipes.cookingMethod: grill the fish and warm the tortillas. Assemble the tacos with the slaw mix, sour cream, lime, and hot sauce

recipes.name: Mexican Street Corn
recipes.cookingMethod: grill the corn, then spread mayonnaise on it and sprinkle with cotija cheese, chili powder, and lime juice

recipes.name: Chiles Rellenos
recipes.cookingMethod: roast the peppers, then stuff them with the ground beef mixture and cheese. Bake in tomato sauce

recipes.name: Mole Sauce
recipes.cookingMethod: blend all ingredients together to create the mole sauce

recipes.name: Tres Leches Cake
recipes.cookingMethod: bake the cake, then soak in a mixture of the milks. Top with whipped cream and sliced strawberries
